name: Beef Creatures
description:
BEEF CREATURES BEEF CREATURES BEEF CREATURES !!!

Are you tired of NOT playing the perfect RTSTD with 100% REAL BEEF CREATURES FOR up to 4 REAL PLAYERS?!

Welp. You´re welcome.
(BIG UPDATE ON THE WAY SO STAY TUNED)

HOW TO PLAY:
[Controllers needed]

- X Builds a Turret

- B Builds a Creature spawner

- Y Upgrades whatever you have selected ( Also the ground ? )

HOW TO WIN:

- Don´t die

- Absolutely SLAUGHTER your enemies with 3 different grotesque Beef Creatures at your disposal ( More to come? )


- Defend your kingdom with the most destructive tech known to man!!?
That's right; UPGRADEABLE TOWERS THAT SHOOT STUFF???!

CREDITS:
- Casper Knudsen - CG / Art Director / Concept

- Pia Hansen - CG / Animation

- Michael Jarberg - CG / Animation

- Anders Bjørn - Programming / Sound Design / Music

- Mikkel - Programming


MUSIC:

BRUTAL BEEF MUSIC!!!

A Nordic Game Jam 2017 Special By Team Brutal Beef
